actions.name: Battery

cost.trigger: An ally within Range uses an Electric-Type attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: An ally within Range uses an Electric-Type attack.

Effect: The triggering creature does not consume PP for the triggering attack, and that creature freely uses Charge at the end of their Activation.
